title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: A swashbuckling adventure about a pirate who teams up with a blacksmith to rescue a governor's daughter from cursed pirates.

title: Lost in Translation
description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her homeland with the help of a group of female prisoners.

title: Deadpool
description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
